record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that there now be a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to have printed in the Record a letter and accompanying section 102(b) report from the Office of Compliance Board of Directors.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
